formatted_address: Ang Mo Kio Ave 4, #01-580 Blk 157, Singapore 560157
name: Q & M Dental Surgery (Mayflower)

reviews.text: Had a small chipped at the back of my front tooth. Made an appointment with Q&M @ Blk 157 amk. The booking was swift and easy. Came in on time and gotten my tooth fixed in less than 10mins. Price was reasonable for me. The dentist was also very kind to answer some of my questions about other issues regarding my gum and gave good advice.

Dr Cherise Lau was very meticulous and thorough with her work, and also went beyond what I expected from the session, providing her expertise and advice so that I can keep my teeth and gums healthy. I had always felt pain and discomfort in my past experiences with scaling and polishing at other clinics, but I felt little to no pain nor discomfort with Dr Lau, which gave me a very positive experience. Thanks Dr Lau and team for making my session comfortable!

Dr. Seah is the best dentist that I‚Äôve ever met!!! I used to be super scared of seeing dentist, but everytime when I book his appointment, I feel calm as I know it‚Äôs painless. He is so skillful and detailed, very gentle and will minimize the pain!! I visit him for many many times, did both wisdom tooth extraction and root canal, no pain at all!!
I appreciate him so much, he worth 10 stars and more!!! Will go back visit him everytime when I have tooth issue üëçüèª
Dr Cherise Lau is so patient and gentle, she explained every step to my 10 year old while doing filling for him. He was so comfortable he said he almost fell asleep üòÜ

First time visited this clinic for cleaning and polishing service. I had a pleasant experience with Dr Lau, and the staffs there are all good too. Prices also very reasonable.

I feel grateful for having met such a wonderful dentist today, satisfied with my first visit and will definitely come back again for her professional services!
